Author: Marulu, StreetRat
Name: XIVR - VR Mod
Description:
** Requires SteamVR **
The following Settings have to be enabled for the mod to operate:
In XIVLauncher: Choose how to load dalamud: New
In InGame Dalamud Settings: Wait for plugins before game loads

Please click the globe icon for detailed instructions.
Chat/FAQ: flat2vr.com
